br.unesp.rc.curriculumGenerator.apachepoi.utils

Class GenerateCurriculum

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.unesp.rc.curriculumGenerator.apachepoi.utils.GenerateCurriculum
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CurriculumModel1

    public abstract class GenerateCurriculum
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used to define the basic steps to generate a curriculum file. All Curriculum Model class should extends this.

      • Export

        public java.io.File Export(Curriculum curriculum)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        The generated ".docx" file is exported to the path: $PROJECT\generatedCurriculum\
        Parameters:
        curriculum - The curriculum to generate the file.
        Returns:
        The "File" class with the instance to the ".docx" file generated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidOperationException - Curriculum's user is not defined
